name: Folded Brass Cuff with Recycled T-Shirt Cord
description:
Rockstar? Arthouse siren? Jetsetter? Who ever you want to be today, this bracelet will accent your chosen role.

To create the center piece of this bracelet, I took a brass sheet and hammered, textured, folded, flamed, hammered, flamed, folded, flamed...until it looked satisfactorily destroyed and then cut out a rectangle. Holes were drilled and copper tube rivets set into the holes. Then the edges were sanded sooth and a chemical was applied to remove some (but not all) the black schmutz from the flaming. The piece was then hand polished to bring out the brass shine on the high points and then lacquered to preserve the patina. I laced the metal with two strips of recycled white jersey t-shirt material and tied off the ends. The result is a tight fitting cuff that goes on and off like a bangle (thanks tot he stretchy t-shirt material). The whole process from start to finish took about 3.5 hours. Whew!

Bracelet measures approximately 7.5" in length flat and will fit most wrists. I can lengthen or shorten the t-shirt strips to make the bracelet bigger of smaller if needed. I can also change the color of the t-shirt material to black, or grey, or whatever else I have in stock. Convo me for details.

Brass and copper metals, recycled cotton t-shirt material.

name: Stone and Folded Disc Earrings
description:
Form folded copper discs with rainbow aquamarine dangle. Raw metal sheet was form folded by hand and flame colored for a unique patina. Discs were cut from sheet and lacquered to preserve coloring. Rainbow aquamarine stone was added to the bottom of the disc. Handmade trademark "no slip" design earwires.

Earrings measure approximately 1 1/8" from bottom of earwire. Copper discs, sterling silver earwire and wrap, silk fabric, prehnite stone. Earwire can be changed to sterling silver or gold filled wire upon request for a small additional charge.

You will receive the exact earrings pictured. Note that color may vary from monitor display. And since these are entirely handmade, they may differ from each other slightly. But you already knew that...

name: Fabric Wrapped Disc Earrings
description:
Handformed domed brass disc earrings with fabric wrap and single stone. Metal was cut into discs and hammered for texture. Discs were domed to add dimension, and then lacquered to preserve patina. Earrings were wrapped with polyester fabric from an upcycled ladies' blouse. Handmade trademark "no slip" design earwires.

Earrings measure approximately 1 3/8" from bottom of earwire. All brass metal, silf fabric, prehnite stone. Earwire can be changed to sterling silver or gold filled wire upon request for a small additional charge.

You will receive the exact earrings pictured. Note that color may vary from monitor display.  And since these are entirely handmade, they may differ from each other slightly. But you already knew that...

name: Hammered Double Disc Earrings in Brass
description:
Handmade double brass disc earrings. Metal cut into discs, then hammered for texture. Discs were then domed to add dimension, then antiqued, polished, and lacquered to preserve the patina. Handmade trademark "no slip" design earwires.

Discs measure approximately 1.75" from bottom of earwire. All brass metal. Earwire can be changed to gold filled upon request for a small additional charge.

You will receive earrings *similar* to the ones pictured. Note that color may vary from monitor display. And since these are entirely handmade, they may differ from each other slightly. But you already knew that...

name: Medium Folded Disc Earrings in Copper
description:
Handmade, flame colored, copper disc earrings. Metal was folded and forged by hand, then cut into discs. Discs were then domed to add dimension, flame colored, and lacquered to preserve the patina. Handmade trademark "no slip" design copper earwires.

Discs measure approximately 1.0" from bottom of earwire. all copper metal. Earwire can be changed to sterling silver or gold filled upon request for a small additional charge.

You will receive the exact discs pictured. Note that color may vary from monitor display.  And since these are entirely handmade, they may differ from each other slightly. But you already knew that...
